Text:
What an irony - a man teaching wolves how to become... wolves ;) The true Call Of the Wild.
Hope to meet Shaun in Poland soon.

Thanx bell0q!
Yes, quite the fascinating irony. You're welcome, friend.

Why did you save it as a .mkv file, I've spent 15 minutes trying to figure out why I couldn't run it with VLC, and now I have to download more programs just to watch a 45 minute show. Fuck you, next time use .avi you filthy elitist nerd.

Its probably your 15 year old computer it to slow to play hd movies anyway. MKV is a much better wrapper than the outdated avi. MKV supports larger video files, multiple audio & subtitle tracks. Its a stupid 200k download, even on your 14.4 modem that will only take one minute. http://www.free-codecs.com/download/Matroska_Splitter.htm Maybe someone will be nice enough to repost this is a 320x240 mpeg1 video for you.
